newsitem.title: ROMANIA: SOCCER-ROMANIA CLUB BOSS OUTLAWED BY LOCAL TOWN.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-ROMANIA CLUB BOSS OUTLAWED BY LOCAL TOWN.

text.p: Local authorities in the town of Craiova have declared Jiul Petrosani soccer club president Miron Cozma persona non grata in their city, the daily Adevarul said on Monday.

"Cozma's presence in Craiova... will be a danger for local order", said Adevarul, quoting an official statement from Craiova, 230 kms west of Bucharest. Cozma is Romania's miners' leader and has a history of violent behaviour.
The Romanian Soccer Federation last week banned and fined Cozma for headbutting a Dinamo Bucharest player during a half-time fracas at the Petrosani stadium.
Jiul Petrosani are due to play a first division league match against Universitatea next Saturday in Craiova.
Under Romanian law, towns can ban individuals they consider to be a threat to public order.
